titles.title: Faith-Based Lending Protection Act
To amend the Federal Credit Union Act with respect to the limitations on member business loans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2328)
Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

bill.summary: 12/20/2011--Introduced. Faith-Based Lending Protection Act - Amends the Federal Credit Union Act to exempt loans made to nonprofit religious organizations from the limitations on the volume of loans credit unions can make to businesses.
